description: Primes with 6 as smallest primitive root.
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 864.

Index entries for primes by primitive root
mathematica: Prime[ Select[ Range[1000], PrimitiveRoot[ Prime[ # ] ] == 6 & ] ](* or *)Select[ Prime@Range@760, PrimitiveRoot@# == 6 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 11 2001 *)
